select c.`name` as `carrierName`, c.type as carrierType, c.settle_type as settleType, d.user_id as userId, d.`name` as `name`, d.real_name as realName, d.phone as phone, d.type as type, d.`mode` as `mode`, d.id_card as idCard, r.plate_no as plateNo, r.running_state as runningState from d_carrier c join d_carrier_driver_con con on con.carrier_id = c.id join d_driver d on con.driver_id = d.id LEFT JOIN d_vehicle_running r on d.id = r.driver_id
and d.type = 0
and d.type != 0 and (d.mode = 1 or d.mode = 3)
and d.type != 0 and (d.mode = 2 or d.mode = 3)
and d.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and d.real_name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and r.id_card like CONCAT('%',#{idCard},'%')
and r.plate_no like CONCAT('%',#{plateNo},'%')

select d.* from d_driver d join s_user_role_dept urd on d.id = urd.user_id where urd.dept_id = #{carrierId} and urd.dept_type = 2 AND urd.user_type = 2 and urd.state = 2 and d.business_state = 0 limit 1

SELECT dc.id AS carrierId, dd.id AS driverId, dd.real_name AS realName, dd.phone AS phone, dcdc.MODE AS MODE, dd.id_card AS idCard, sbcb.card_name AS cardName, sbcb.bank_name AS bankName, sbcb.card_no AS cardNo, dd.id_card_front_img AS idCardFrontImg, dd.id_card_back_img AS idCardBackImg, dd.driver_licence_front_img AS driverLicenceFrontImg, dd.driver_licence_back_img AS driverLicenceBackImg, dd.travel_licence_front_img AS travelLicenceFrontImg, dd.travel_licence_back_img AS travelLicenceBackImg, dd.taxi_licence_front_img AS taxiLicenceFrontImg, dd.taxi_licence_back_img AS taxiLicenceBackImg, dd.qualifi_cert_front_img AS qualifiCertFrontImg, dd.qualifi_cert_back_img AS qualifiCertBackImg, dvr.vehicle_id AS vehicleId, dvr.plate_no AS plateNo, dvr.carry_car_num AS defaultCarryNum FROM d_carrier dc LEFT JOIN d_carrier_driver_con dcdc ON dcdc.carrier_id = dc.id LEFT JOIN d_driver dd ON dd.id = dcdc.driver_id LEFT JOIN d_vehicle_running dvr ON dvr.driver_id = dd.id LEFT JOIN s_bank_card_bind sbcb ON sbcb.user_id = dc.id WHERE dc.id = #{carrierId}

SELECT dri.id AS id, dri.user_id as userId, dri.name as name, dri.real_name as realName, dri.id_card as idCard, dri.phone AS phone FROM d_driver dri JOIN d_carrier_driver_con cdc ON cdc.driver_id = dri.id JOIN d_carrier carr ON carr.id = cdc.carrier_id WHERE carr.id = #{carrierId} and cdc.role = 3
SELECT carr.id FROM d_carrier carr JOIN d_carrier_driver_con cdc ON cdc.carrier_id = carr.id JOIN d_driver driver ON cdc.driver_id = driver.id WHERE driver.id = #{driverId}

SELECT dri.id AS driverId, dri.realName AS realName, dri.phone AS phone, dri.MODE AS MODE, dri.business_state AS businessState, dri.state AS state, dri.identity AS identity, veh.plate_no AS plateNo, veh.default_carry_num AS defaultCarryNum FROM d_driver dri left JOIN d_driver_vehicle_con dvc ON dvc.driver_id = dri.id left JOIN d_vehicle veh ON veh.id = dvc.vehicle_id WHERE dri.id in
#{driverIds}

SELECT dd.id AS driverId, dcdc.carrier_id AS carrierId, dd.real_name AS realName, dd.phone AS phone, dcdc.MODE AS MODE, dd.id_card as idCard, dd.business_state AS businessState, dd.id_card_front_img as idCardFrontImg, dd.id_card_back_img as idCardBackImg, dcdc.state AS state, dcdc.role as role, dd.identity AS identity, dvr.vehicle_id as vehicleId, dvr.plate_no AS plateNo, dvr.carry_car_num AS defaultCarryNum FROM d_driver dd LEFT JOIN d_carrier_driver_con dcdc ON dcdc.driver_id = dd.id LEFT JOIN d_carrier dc ON dc.id = dcdc.carrier_id LEFT JOIN d_vehicle_running dvr ON dvr.driver_id = dd.id
dd.real_name like CONCAT('%',#{realName},'%')
and dd.phone like CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%')
and dvr.plate_no like CONCAT('%',#{plateNo},'%')
and dc.id = #{carrierId} and dc.type = 2 and dc.state < 9

SELECT dd.id AS driverId, dd.real_name AS realName, dd.phone AS phone, dcdc.MODE AS MODE FROM d_driver dd LEFT JOIN d_carrier_driver_con dcdc ON dcdc.driver_id = dd.id
dd.real_name like CONCAT('%',#{realName},'%')
and dcdc.carrier_id = #{carrierId} and dcdc.state = 2
SELECT ddvc.driver_id FROM d_driver_vehicle_con ddvc LEFT JOIN d_vehicle dv ON dv.id = ddvc.vehicle_id where dv.carrier_id = #{carrierId}

SELECT dc.id as carrierId, dc.`name` as `name`, dd.id AS driverId, dd.real_name AS driverName, dd.phone AS driverPhone, dvr.plate_no AS vehiclePlateNo, dd.id_card AS idCard, dvr.carry_car_num AS carryCarNum, dvr.occupied_car_num AS occupiedCarNum, dd.business_state AS businessState, dcdc.mode as mode FROM d_carrier dc LEFT JOIN d_carrier_driver_con dcdc on dcdc.carrier_id = dc.id LEFT JOIN d_driver dd on dcdc.driver_id = dd.id LEFT JOIN d_vehicle_running dvr ON dvr.driver_id = dd.id
dd.real_name like CONCAT('%',#{realName},'%')
or dvr.plate_no like CONCAT('%',#{plateNo},'%')
or dd.phone like CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%')
and dd.id_card = #{idCard}
AND dc.state = 2 and dc.business_state = 0 AND dcdc.state = 2 AND dc.type = 1 and dc.mode = 3 group by dd.phone

SELECT
FROM d_driver d LEFT JOIN d_carrier_driver_con con ON con.driver_id = d.id LEFT JOIN d_carrier c ON c.id = con.carrier_id WHERE c.id = #{carrierId}
select * from d_driver
select no from d_driver

SELECT dcdc.driver_id FROM d_driver dd LEFT JOIN d_carrier_driver_con dcdc ON dcdc.driver_id = dd.id LEFT JOIN d_carrier dc ON dc.id = dcdc.carrier_id WHERE dc.id = #{carrierId} AND dcdc.state < 9 AND dc.state < 9

SELECT dc.id as carrierId, dd.id AS driverId, dd.real_name AS realName, dd.phone AS phone, dd.id_card AS idCard, dd.id_card_front_img AS idCardFrontImg, dd.id_card_back_img AS idCardBackImg, dcdc.MODE AS MODE, dcdc.state AS state, dd.business_state AS businessState, dvr.vehicle_id AS vehicleId, dvr.plate_no AS plateNo FROM d_driver dd LEFT JOIN d_carrier_driver_con dcdc ON dcdc.driver_id = dd.id LEFT JOIN d_carrier dc ON dc.id = dcdc.carrier_id LEFT JOIN d_vehicle_running dvr ON dvr.driver_id = dd.id where dc.id = #{carrierId} and dc.type = 2 and dcdc.state < 5 and dcdc.role < 2 order by dd.create_time desc,dd.check_time desc

SELECT ( CASE sr.role_name WHEN '个人司机' THEN 0 WHEN '下属司机' THEN 1 WHEN '承运商管理员' THEN 2 WHEN '承运商超级管理员' THEN 3 END ) AS role, surd.user_id AS driverId, run.carry_car_num AS carryCarNum, run.occupied_car_num AS occupiedCarNum, run.plate_no AS plateNo, run.running_state AS runningState, d.business_state AS businessState, d.real_name AS realName, d.id_card AS idCard, d.phone AS phone, d.id AS loginId FROM d_driver d LEFT JOIN s_user_role_dept surd ON d.id = surd.user_id LEFT JOIN d_vehicle_running run ON d.id = run.driver_id LEFT JOIN s_role sr ON sr.id = surd.role_id
surd.state = ${@com.cjyc.common.model.enums.CommonStateEnum@CHECKED.code} and surd.dept_id=#{carrierId} and run.driver_id is not null
and ( d.real_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or d.phone like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or run.plate_no like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') )

SELECT dv.id AS vehicleId, dv.plate_no AS plateNo, dv.default_carry_num AS carryCarNum, dvr.occupied_car_num AS occupiedCarNum, dd.id AS driverId, dd.real_name AS realName, dd.phone AS phone FROM d_vehicle dv LEFT JOIN d_driver_vehicle_con ddvc ON ddvc.vehicle_id = dv.id LEFT JOIN d_driver dd ON dd.id = ddvc.driver_id LEFT JOIN d_vehicle_running dvr ON dvr.driver_id = dd.id where dv.carrier_id = #{carrierId} order by dv.create_time desc

SELECT dd.id AS driverId, dd.real_name AS realName, dd.phone AS phone, dcdc.MODE AS MODE FROM d_driver dd LEFT JOIN d_carrier_driver_con dcdc ON dcdc.driver_id = dd.id
dd.real_name like CONCAT('%',#{realName},'%')
and dcdc.carrier_id = #{carrierId} and dcdc.state = 2 order by dd.create_time desc,dd.check_time desc

SELECT dd.real_name AS realName, dd.phone AS phone, dd.id_card AS idCard, dvr.vehicle_id AS vehicleId, dvr.plate_no AS plateNo, dcdc.MODE AS MODE, dd.id_card_front_img AS idCardFrontImg, dd.id_card_back_img AS idCardBackImg, dd.driver_licence_front_img AS driverLicenceFrontImg, dd.qualifi_cert_front_img AS qualifiCertFrontImg, dd.taxi_licence_front_img AS taxiLicenceFrontImg, dd.travel_licence_front_img AS travelLicenceFrontImg FROM d_driver dd LEFT JOIN d_carrier_driver_con dcdc ON dcdc.driver_id = dd.id LEFT JOIN d_vehicle_running dvr ON dvr.driver_id = dd.id where dcdc.id = #{roleId} and dd.id = #{loginId} and dcdc.state <= 2

SELECT count( dd.id ) FROM d_driver dd LEFT JOIN d_carrier_driver_con dcdc ON dcdc.driver_id = dd.id LEFT JOIN d_carrier dc ON dc.id = dcdc.carrier_id WHERE dc.type = 2 AND ( dd.phone = #{phone} OR dd.id_card = #{idCard})

SELECT count( dd.id ) FROM d_driver dd LEFT JOIN d_carrier_driver_con dcdc ON dcdc.driver_id = dd.id LEFT JOIN d_carrier dc ON dc.id = dcdc.carrier_id WHERE dc.type = 1 AND ( dd.phone = #{phone} and dd.id_card = #{idCard}) and dd.id <> #{loginId}

SELECT dc.id AS carrierId, dd.id AS driverId, dd.real_name AS realName, dd.phone AS phone, surd.MODE AS MODE, dd.id_card AS idCard, sbcb.card_name AS cardName, sbcb.bank_name AS bankName, sbcb.card_no AS cardNo, dd.id_card_front_img AS idCardFrontImg, dd.id_card_back_img AS idCardBackImg, dd.driver_licence_front_img AS driverLicenceFrontImg, dd.driver_licence_back_img AS driverLicenceBackImg, dd.travel_licence_front_img AS travelLicenceFrontImg, dd.travel_licence_back_img AS travelLicenceBackImg, dd.taxi_licence_front_img AS taxiLicenceFrontImg, dd.taxi_licence_back_img AS taxiLicenceBackImg, dd.qualifi_cert_front_img AS qualifiCertFrontImg, dd.qualifi_cert_back_img AS qualifiCertBackImg, dvr.vehicle_id AS vehicleId, dvr.plate_no AS plateNo, dvr.carry_car_num AS defaultCarryNum FROM d_carrier dc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM s_user_role_dept WHERE dept_type = 2 AND user_type = 2 ) surd ON surd.dept_id = dc.id LEFT JOIN d_driver dd ON dd.id = surd.user_id LEFT JOIN d_vehicle_running dvr ON dvr.driver_id = dd.id LEFT JOIN s_bank_card_bind sbcb ON sbcb.user_id = dc.id WHERE dc.id = #{carrierId}

SELECT dc.id as carrierId, dd.id AS driverId, dd.real_name AS realName, dd.phone AS phone, dd.id_card AS idCard, dd.id_card_front_img AS idCardFrontImg, dd.id_card_back_img AS idCardBackImg, surd.MODE AS MODE, surd.state AS state, dd.business_state AS businessState, dvr.vehicle_id AS vehicleId, dvr.plate_no AS plateNo FROM d_driver dd LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM s_user_role_dept WHERE dept_type = 2 AND user_type = 2) surd ON surd.user_id = dd.id LEFT JOIN d_carrier dc ON dc.id = surd.dept_id LEFT JOIN d_vehicle_running dvr ON dvr.driver_id = dd.id LEFT JOIN s_role sr ON sr.id = surd.role_id where dc.id = #{carrierId} and dc.type = 2 and surd.state < 5 AND sr.role_id = #{roleId} order by dd.create_time desc,dd.check_time desc

SELECT dd.id AS driverId, dd.real_name AS realName, dd.phone AS phone, surd.MODE AS MODE FROM d_driver dd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM s_user_role_dept WHERE dept_type = 2 AND user_type = 2 ) surd ON surd.user_id = dd.id
dd.real_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{realName},'%')
AND surd.dept_id = #{carrierId} AND surd.state = 2 ORDER BY dd.create_time DESC,dd.check_time DESC

SELECT count( dd.id ) FROM d_driver dd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM s_user_role_dept WHERE dept_type = 2 AND user_type = 2 ) surd ON surd.user_id = dd.id LEFT JOIN d_carrier dc ON dc.id = surd.dept_id WHERE dc.type = 2 AND ( dd.phone = #{phone} OR dd.id_card = #{idCard})

SELECT count( dd.id ) FROM d_driver dd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM s_user_role_dept WHERE dept_type = 2 AND user_type = 2 ) surd ON surd.user_id = dd.id LEFT JOIN d_carrier dc ON dc.id = surd.dept_id WHERE dc.type = 1 AND ( dd.phone = #{phone} and dd.id_card = #{idCard}) and dd.id <> #{loginId}

SELECT dd.real_name AS realName, dd.phone AS phone, dd.id_card AS idCard, dvr.vehicle_id AS vehicleId, dvr.plate_no AS plateNo, surd.MODE AS MODE, dd.id_card_front_img AS idCardFrontImg, dd.id_card_back_img AS idCardBackImg, dd.driver_licence_front_img AS driverLicenceFrontImg, dd.qualifi_cert_front_img AS qualifiCertFrontImg, dd.taxi_licence_front_img AS taxiLicenceFrontImg, dd.travel_licence_front_img AS travelLicenceFrontImg FROM d_driver dd LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM s_user_role_dept WHERE dept_type = 2 AND user_type = 2) surd ON surd.user_id = dd.id LEFT JOIN d_vehicle_running dvr ON dvr.driver_id = dd.id WHERE surd.id = #{roleId} AND dd.id = #{loginId} AND surd.state <= 2

SELECT dd.id AS driverId, dd.real_name AS realName, dd.phone AS phone, surd.MODE AS MODE FROM d_driver dd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM s_user_role_dept WHERE dept_type = 2 AND user_type = 2 ) surd ON surd.user_id = dd.id
dd.real_name like CONCAT('%',#{realName},'%')
and surd.dept_id = #{carrierId} and surd.state = 2

SELECT dd.id AS driverId, dc.id AS carrierId, dd.real_name AS realName, dd.phone AS phone, surd.MODE AS MODE, dd.id_card AS idCard, dd.business_state AS businessState, dd.id_card_front_img AS idCardFrontImg, dd.id_card_back_img AS idCardBackImg, surd.state AS state, ( CASE sr.role_name WHEN '个人司机' THEN 0 WHEN '下属司机' THEN 1 WHEN '承运商管理员' THEN 2 WHEN '承运商超级管理员' THEN 3 END ) AS role, dd.identity AS identity, dvr.vehicle_id AS vehicleId, dvr.plate_no AS plateNo, dvr.carry_car_num AS defaultCarryNum FROM d_driver dd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM s_user_role_dept WHERE dept_type = 2 AND user_type = 2 ) surd ON surd.user_id = dd.id LEFT JOIN d_carrier dc ON dc.id = surd.dept_id LEFT JOIN d_vehicle_running dvr ON dvr.driver_id = dd.id LEFT JOIN s_role sr ON sr.id = surd.role_id
dd.real_name like CONCAT('%',#{realName},'%')
and dd.phone like CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%')
and dvr.plate_no like CONCAT('%',#{plateNo},'%')
and dc.id = #{carrierId} and dc.type = 2 and dc.state < 9
